meanings.sent1: The car is newer than the old one.
meanings.sent2: This phone is newer than my previous one.
meanings.sent3: She bought a newer dress for the party.
meanings.sent4: The newer version of the software is faster.
meanings.sent5: The newer model of the car has better features.

meanings.definition: Being the later or more recent of two.
meanings.sent1: The newer book is on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the newer design of the building.
meanings.sent3: He chose the newer shoes for the occasion.
meanings.sent4: The newer painting in the gallery caught my eye.
meanings.sent5: The newer movie is more exciting than the old one.
